name: Flygon
author: Daisuke Ito
flavor_text: It whips up sandstorms with powerful flaps of its wings. It is known as “The Desert Spirit.”

poke_body.name: Irritating Buzz
poke_body.effect: As long as Flygon is your Active Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent’s Active Pokémon between turns, excluding {F} Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sand Sonic
attacks.effect: If you attach a {F} Energy card from your hand to Flygon during this turn, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage.
